agents.name: CEO Morning Briefing v2
agents.description: Enhanced executive briefing that integrates with dashboard API for real-time KPIs, agent health, pipeline changes, overnight results, and KPI change detection with trend analysis

agents.name: CEO Decision Support
agents.description: Monitors Airtable for new decisions, gathers context from category-specific handlers, runs Claude analysis with multiple options, pros/cons, and recommendations, then sends formatted decision cards via email

agents.name: CEO Productivity
agents.description: Manages CEO weekly productivity rhythm with themed days, daily focus reminders, time tracking per category, weekly reviews, and delegation checks when tasks exceed 30 minutes

agents.name: Sales New Business
agents.description: Manages cold outreach to new leads via personalized AI-generated email sequences with multi-language support (DE/FR/IT), follow-up sequences, rate limiting, and Swiss anti-spam compliance

agents.name: Sales Partnership Manager
agents.description: Identifies potential partners (marketing agencies, web studios, Treuhand, consultants, IT companies), generates personalized pitch emails, manages partnership pipeline, tracks referral performance and commissions

agents.name: Sales Pricing Engine
agents.description: Dynamic quote generation based on industry, kanton, scope, languages, and urgency with branded PDF output via Puppeteer, A/B testing of pricing variants, and data-driven pricing recommendations

agents.name: Sales Inside Sales Bot
agents.description: Express API backend for website chat widget using Claude for real-time conversational AI with multi-language support (DE/FR/IT/EN), lead qualification scoring, structured conversation flow, and automatic escalation

agents.name: Sales Key Account Manager
agents.description: Monitors active clients with health scoring, usage tracking, NPS monitoring, upsell detection, bi-weekly personalized check-in emails, churn signal flagging, and monthly health reports

agents.name: Sales Lead Qualifier
agents.description: Advanced lead qualification with multi-factor scoring (website quality, business size, responsiveness, budget fit), Swiss-specific signals (.ch domain, phone format, canton-tier), industry weighting, and dashboard sync

agents.name: Sales Follow-Up
agents.description: Intelligent follow-up email sequences with business-hours awareness (8am-6pm CET), deep personalization by industry/kanton/company, A/B test variants, escalation after 3 unanswered emails, and Swiss-compliant unsubscribe handling

agents.name: Sales Pipeline Manager
agents.description: Intelligent pipeline management with automatic stage progression rules, stale lead detection (14-day threshold), pipeline velocity calculation per stage, and weekly pipeline summary reports with AI insights

agents.name: Marketing Content Engine
agents.description: Generates SEO-optimized blog content via Claude, manages content calendar (4 weeks ahead), produces multi-language content (DE/FR/EN), creates social media snippets, and performs quality checks on readability and keyword density

agents.name: Marketing SEO Optimizer
agents.description: Advanced SEO analysis with keyword density analysis, competitor keyword gap identification, Swiss-specific SEO (.ch TLD, hreflang de-CH/fr-CH/it-CH), on-page recommendations, technical SEO audits, and monthly SEO reports

agents.name: Marketing Social Media
agents.description: Multi-platform social media management with platform-specific content optimization (LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook), Swiss market hashtag optimization, scheduling at optimal Swiss timezone slots, and A/B content variants

agents.name: Marketing Email Campaigns
agents.description: Email marketing via MailerLite API with subscriber management, campaign automation, A/B subject line testing, segmentation by language/industry/engagement, and automated sequences (Welcome, Nurture, Upsell, Re-engagement, Onboarding)

agents.name: Marketing Performance
agents.description: Manages Google Ads campaign preparation, keyword management per industry/language, AI-powered ad copy generation, budget optimization (CPC/CPA/ROAS tracking), competitor ad monitoring, and landing page conversion recommendations

agents.name: Marketing Brand Manager
agents.description: Maintains brand guidelines (voice, tone, colors, typography), reviews content from other agents for brand consistency via Claude, generates brand assets (email signatures, presentation templates), and creates seasonal campaign briefs

agents.name: Marketing PR & Media
agents.description: Generates press releases for milestones, manages journalist/media contact database, pitches to Swiss media (Handelszeitung, Bilanz, NZZ, PME Magazine), creates thought leadership content, and monitors media coverage

agents.name: Product Strategy
agents.description: Maintains product roadmap, collects and RICE-scores feature requests, monitors competitor features via web scraping, manages service packages, and generates monthly product reports

agents.name: Product Innovation
agents.description: Scans for new AI models/tools/APIs from Anthropic, OpenAI, and Hugging Face, runs benchmarks, manages experiments, tracks AI costs, and produces monthly innovation reports

agents.name: Product Customer Experience
agents.description: Maps customer journey, manages NPS surveys, performs sentiment analysis, predicts churn, monitors onboarding flows, calculates health scores, and generates intervention recommendations

agents.name: Product Pricing Strategy
agents.description: Analyzes competitor pricing via web scraping, tracks price sensitivity, calculates customer LTV, recommends pricing changes, models price impact scenarios, and manages promotions

agents.name: Product Quality Management
agents.description: Reviews all outputs from all agents before delivery, checking grammar, spelling, brand voice, factual accuracy, SEO quality, email quality, and report accuracy with per-agent quality scores and improvement feedback

agents.name: Operations Process Automation
agents.description: Orchestrates inter-agent workflows using task queue with workflow definitions (New Lead, New Client, Content Publish), task execution with retries (max 3), and SLA monitoring with alerts

agents.name: Operations Translation Engine
agents.description: Multi-language translation engine with Swiss localization (DE-CH, FR-CH, IT-CH), DeepL integration for base translation, Claude for localization, customer glossary management, and support for plain text, Markdown, and HTML formats

agents.name: Operations Capacity Planning
agents.description: Tracks API usage across all agents (Claude Haiku/Sonnet/Opus, DeepL, MailerLite, Airtable), predicts costs, monitors rate limits, suggests optimizations, manages API key rotation, and provides cost breakdowns

agents.name: Operations Service Quality
agents.description: Real-time monitoring of client deliverables with SLA tracking, feedback integration, complaint handling with categorization, quality trend analysis, and monthly quality reporting to CEO

agents.name: Operations Infrastructure
agents.description: Monitors website uptime, API health, email deliverability with 5-minute health checks, manages daily Airtable data backups, security scanning for exposed keys, SSL expiry monitoring, and auto-restart for crashed agents

agents.name: Finance Controlling
agents.description: Tracks P&L per client, service, and industry with unit economics calculation, margin analysis, budget vs actual comparison, monthly P&L statements in Markdown, and alerts when margins fall below 80%

agents.name: Finance FP&A
agents.description: Financial Planning & Analysis with revenue forecasting (MRR, NRR, growth rate), cash flow projections, scenario modeling (bull/base/bear), cohort analysis, growth metrics, linear regression prediction, and board-ready dashboards

agents.name: Finance Treasury
agents.description: Swiss QR Bill invoice generation, auto-sending after service delivery, payment tracking and matching, dunning process (15/30/45 day escalation), Treuhand-compatible exports, and MWST/VAT tracking

agents.name: Finance Fundraising
agents.description: Manages investor-ready data room, auto-updates KPI dashboard with investor metrics, generates pitch deck data, tracks investors, prepares bank loan documentation, and models funding scenarios

agents.name: Finance M&A Scout
agents.description: Identifies acquisition targets (translation bureaus, agencies, SaaS), monitors Handelsregister for opportunities, tracks consolidation trends, generates acquisition briefs, and values targets using revenue/EBITDA multiples and synergy analysis

agents.name: Strategy Market Analyst
agents.description: Advanced Swiss KMU market analysis with TAM/SAM/SOM calculation, market size estimation by industry, growth trend tracking, competitive positioning matrix, and quarterly market intelligence briefings with dashboard sync

agents.name: Strategy OKR Tracker
agents.description: Tracks OKR progress with confidence scoring, automated status updates from pipeline/agent data, alignment visualization (company to department to team), risk flagging for at-risk OKRs, and weekly OKR summary for CEO

agents.name: Strategy M&A Analysis
agents.description: Performs due diligence, financial modeling (DCF, comparable company, revenue multiples), integration planning, risk assessment, and synergy analysis for potential acquisition targets

agents.name: Strategy Market Expansion
agents.description: Analyzes new market potential across DACH, BeNeLux, and France with TAM/SAM/SOM sizing, competitive landscape evaluation, regulatory requirements, localization needs, and go-to-market strategy proposals

agents.name: Strategy Competitor Intelligence
agents.description: Monitors 10-15 competitors weekly via Puppeteer screenshots, pricing/services/blog/social/job posting tracking, win/loss analysis, SWOT analysis via Claude, feature comparison matrix, and monthly competitive reports

agents.name: Strategy Business Development
agents.description: Evaluates business models (white-label, API-as-a-service, vertical SaaS, franchise), performs revenue modeling per model, identifies partnership opportunities, builds business cases with projected P&L, and manages innovation pipeline

agents.name: HR Recruiting
agents.description: Manages freelancer recruitment pipeline with AI-optimized job postings per platform (Fiverr, Upwork, RemoteOK, jobs.ch, LinkedIn), AI-powered application screening, test task scheduling, performance tracking, and contract/NDA management

agents.name: Master Orchestrator
agents.description: Boots all 42 agents in dependency order, manages health monitoring with 5-minute intervals, inter-agent messaging via event bus, performance scoring, nightly self-optimization, and provides a dashboard API on port 3001

CEO.description: Executive briefings, decision support, and CEO productivity management

Sales.description: New business outreach, partnerships, pricing, chat bot, key accounts, lead qualification, follow-ups, and pipeline management

Marketing.description: Content creation, SEO, social media, email campaigns, performance marketing, brand management, and PR/media

Product.description: Product strategy, innovation scanning, customer experience, pricing strategy, and quality management

Operations.description: Process automation, translation, capacity planning, service quality, and infrastructure monitoring

Finance.description: Controlling/P&L, financial planning, treasury/invoicing, fundraising, and M&A scouting

Strategy.description: Market analysis, OKR tracking, M&A analysis, market expansion, competitor intelligence, and business development

HR.description: Freelancer recruiting, training, employer branding, performance management, and compensation

System.description: Master orchestrator for booting, health monitoring, and inter-agent coordination

unmapped_agents.description: Additional agent files that exist but are not in the 43-agent registry. These operate as part of their respective departments but share IDs or serve as extended capabilities.

files.name: HR Training Agent
files.description: Generates SOPs, onboarding guides, knowledge base management, skill assessments, and training materials

files.name: HR Employer Branding Agent
files.description: LinkedIn employer content, Glassdoor responses, hiring posts, culture content, and freelancer testimonials

files.name: HR Performance Management Agent
files.description: Freelancer performance tracking, monthly reviews, bonus calculation, PIPs, and team capacity analysis

files.name: HR Compensation Agent
files.description: Market rate research, compensation benchmarking, rate card management, invoice processing, and payment scheduling

files.name: IT Systems Agent
files.description: Tool integrations, API health monitoring, data sync, config management, and agent version tracking

files.name: IT Automation Agent
files.description: Master workflow orchestrator with error handling, retry logic, performance optimization, and automation suggestions

files.name: IT Data Analytics Agent
files.description: Central data warehouse with dashboard API, standard reports, anomaly detection, and natural language queries

files.name: IT AI Optimization Agent
files.description: Prompt A/B testing, model selection, cost tracking, quality benchmarks, and monthly spend reports

files.name: IT Infrastructure Monitor Agent
files.description: Endpoint availability, response times, SSL certificate expiry, disk space, memory/CPU usage monitoring

files.name: IT Security Scanner Agent
files.description: Dependency vulnerability scanning, SSL/TLS grading, HTTP header auditing, API key rotation tracking, security reports
